fragments.text: Can you post your controller code? My guess is that you only have mapped `/people` and not `/people/{id}`.

informationUnits.rawText:
<servlet-mapping>
    <servlet-name>springmvc</servlet-name>
    <url-pattern>/rest/*</url-pattern>
  </servlet-mapping>

fragments.text: The variable name mismatch did me in... I leave this here as a warning to all... match your variable names!

informationUnits.rawText: The variable name mismatch did me in... I leave this here as a warning to all... match your variable names!

elements.contents: The variable name mismatch did me in... I leave this here as a warning to all... match your variable names!

fragments.text: Your servlet url-pattern is correct. Something else must be going wrong.

informationUnits.rawText: Your servlet url-pattern is correct. Something else must be going wrong.

elements.contents: Your servlet url-pattern is correct. Something else must be going wrong.

fragments.text: Try add a /before the {id}:

informationUnits.rawText: Try add a /before the {id}:
@RequestMapping(value="/{id}", method=RequestMethod.GET)

fragments.text: Without it, the id will be appended directly to the people url, e.g /rest/people1 as opposed to /rest/people/1.

informationUnits.rawText: Without it, the id will be appended directly to the people url, e.g /rest/people1 as opposed to /rest/people/1.
